Option.Name: Front and back, left and right
Front and back, left and right

behaviorVariationId.Wiki: Variation ID used when calculating the action ID.

accountParamId.Wiki: Refers to the Account Param row to use to represent this NPC.

modelId.Wiki: Refers to the Chr ID to use for this NPC.

hitHeight.Wiki: The height of the capsule per character.

hitYOffset.Wiki: Offset of the model display position in the Y (height) direction. It can be floated from the hit position.

getSoul.Wiki: The amount of Misson Score that a character gives at the time of death.

ItemLotId1.Wiki: Specify the itemlot ID given at the time of death. Please set only one of them.

ItemLotId2.Wiki: Specify the itemlot ID given at the time of death. Please set only one of them.

ItemLotId3.Wiki: Specify the itemlot ID given at the time of death. Please set only one of them.

ItemLotId4.Wiki: Specify the itemlot ID given at the time of death. Please set only one of them.

ItemLotId5.Wiki: Specify the itemlot ID given at the time of death. Please set only one of them.

ItemLotId6.Wiki: Specify the itemlot ID given at the time of death. Please set only one of them.

humanityLotId.Wiki: Specify the itemlot ID given when humanity is rewarded.

spEffectID0.Wiki: Special Effect applied to this NPC automatically.

spEffectID1.Wiki: Special Effect applied to this NPC automatically.

spEffectID2.Wiki: Special Effect applied to this NPC automatically.

spEffectID3.Wiki: Special Effect applied to this NPC automatically.

spEffectID4.Wiki: Special Effect applied to this NPC automatically.

spEffectID5.Wiki: Special Effect applied to this NPC automatically.

spEffectID6.Wiki: Special Effect applied to this NPC automatically.

spEffectID7.Wiki: Special Effect applied to this NPC automatically.

GameClearSpEffectID.Wiki: Special Effect applied to this NPC automatically during playthroughs after initial playthrough completion.

guardCutRate_Kinetic.Wiki: Determine the level of negation applied to Kinetic damage received.

guardCutRate_Energy.Wiki: Determine the level of negation applied to Energy damage received.

guardCutRate_Explosive.Wiki: Determine the level of negation applied to Explosive damage received.

guardCutRate_Coral.Wiki: Determine the level of negation applied to Coral damage received.

animIdOffset.Wiki: All animations will be played with IDs shifted by this number. If not, the original animation ID is referenced.

lockGazePoint0.AltName: Lock Gaze Point: Dummy Poly ID [0]
lockGazePoint0.Wiki: Look at the Dummy Polygon ID specified when locking the Lock-on Dummy Polygon ID 22X (-1 Invalid)

lockGazePoint1.AltName: Lock Gaze Point: Dummy Poly ID [1]
lockGazePoint1.Wiki: Look at the Dummy Polygon ID specified when locking the Lock-on Dummy Polygon ID 22X (-1 Invalid)

lockGazePoint2.AltName: Lock Gaze Point: Dummy Poly ID [2]
lockGazePoint2.Wiki: Look at the Dummy Polygon ID specified when locking the Lock-on Dummy Polygon ID 22X (-1 Invalid)

lockGazePoint3.AltName: Lock Gaze Point: Dummy Poly ID [3]
lockGazePoint3.Wiki: Look at the Dummy Polygon ID specified when locking the Lock-on Dummy Polygon ID 22X (-1 Invalid)

lockGazePoint4.AltName: Lock Gaze Point: Dummy Poly ID [4]
lockGazePoint4.Wiki: Look at the Dummy Polygon ID specified when locking the Lock-on Dummy Polygon ID 22X (-1 Invalid)

lockGazePoint5.AltName: Lock Gaze Point: Dummy Poly ID [5]
lockGazePoint5.Wiki: Look at the Dummy Polygon ID specified when locking the Lock-on Dummy Polygon ID 22X (-1 Invalid)

networkWarpDisp.Wiki: Distance to warp instead of complementary movement in network synchronization. Faster people (ex dragons) need to be longer.

dbgBehaviorR1.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorL1.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorR2.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorL2.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorRL.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorRR.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorRD.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorRU.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorLL.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorLR.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorLD.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorLU.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

animIdOffset2.Wiki: All animations will be played with IDs shifted by this number. If not, the animation ID of the animation ID offset 1 is referred to.

partsDamageRate1.Wiki: Magnification to the damage taken when Part 1 is hit. Part 1 is set in cXXXX.hkxpwv file.

partsDamageRate2.Wiki: Magnification to the damage taken when Part 2 is hit. Part 2 is set in cXXXX.hkxpwv file.

partsDamageRate3.Wiki: Magnification to the damage taken when Part 3 is hit. Part 3 is set in cXXXX.hkxpwv file.

partsDamageRate4.Wiki: Magnification to the damage taken when Part 4 is hit. Part 4 is set in cXXXX.hkxpwv file.

partsDamageRate5.Wiki: Magnification to the damage taken when Part 5 is hit. Part 5 is set in cXXXX.hkxpwv file.

partsDamageRate6.Wiki: Magnification to the damage taken when Part 6 is hit. Part 6 is set in cXXXX.hkxpwv file.

partsDamageRate7.Wiki: Magnification to the damage taken when Part 7 is hit. Part 7 is set in cXXXX.hkxpwv file.

partsDamageRate8.Wiki: Magnification to the damage taken when Part 8 is hit. Part 8 is set in cXXXX.hkxpwv file.

weakPartsDamageRate.Wiki: Magnification to the damage taken when Weak Part is hit. Weak Part is set in cXXXX.hkxpwv file.

superArmorRecoverCorrection.Wiki: Correction value for stagger recovery time.

superArmorBrakeKnockbackDist.Wiki: Knockback distance that can be used only at the time of stagger break.

staminaRecoverBaseVel.Wiki: Stagger resistance recovery basic speed [point / s]

def_Kinetic.Wiki: Damage reduction base value for Kinetic attacks.

defSlash.Wiki: Damage reduction base value for Kinetic (Slash) attacks.

defBlow.Wiki: Damage reduction base value for Kinetic (Strike) attacks.

defThrust.Wiki: Damage reduction base value for Kinetic (Thrust) attacks.

def_Energy.Wiki: Damage reduction base value for Energy attacks.

def_Explosive.Wiki: Damage reduction base value for Explosive attacks.

def_Coral.Wiki: Damage reduction base value for Coral attacks.

defFlickPower.Wiki: Used to determine the repelling of enemy attacks.

statusResist_AcsAnomaly.Wiki: Determines resistence to ACS Anomaly status inflict.

statusResist_ElecDischarge.Wiki: Determines resistence to Electric Discharge status inflict.

statusResist_Plasma.Wiki: Determines resistence to Plasma status inflict.

statusResist_ElecDischargeType2.Wiki: Determines resistence to Electric Discharge (Type 2) status inflict.

ghostModelId.Wiki: Replacement model when wandering ghost, texture ID

normalChangeResourceId.Wiki: Replace resource ID during normal operation (do not use it unnecessarily)

guardAngle.Wiki: Defense range angle when guarding weapons. Pending

slashGuardCutRate.Wiki: Looking at the attack type, what percentage of the damage of the slashing attribute is cut? Specify

blowGuardCutRate.Wiki: Looking at the attack type, what percentage of the damage of the hit attribute is cut? Specify

thrustGuardCutRate.Wiki: Looking at the attack type, what percentage of the damage of the piercing attribute is cut? Specify

normalChangeTexChrId.Wiki: Normal replacement texture character ID (do not use it unnecessarily)

dropType.Wiki: Display method when dropping an item (corpse emission or item display)

knockbackRate.Wiki: Decrease value when receiving knockback damage / Specifically, cut the initial knockback speed of the attacking side

knockbackParamId.Wiki: Set the parameter ID used for knockback

staminaGuardDef.Wiki: Defense against enemy stamina attacks when guarding successfully

flickDamageCutRate.Wiki: Set a value to attenuate damage when repelling an attack

npcType.Wiki: NPC type. OK if Zako enemies / boss enemies are distinguished

teamType.Wiki: NPC attack hit / not hit, aim / not aim setting

moveType.Wiki: Moving method. This changes the control.

partsDamageType.Wiki: Determines if weak parts (such as the head) will be affected by all attacks or just arrow attacks.\nHeadshot animation will be used for weak part attacks if it exists.

guardLevel.Wiki: Determines guard hit anim used depending on incoming damageLevel.

statusGuardResist_AcsAnomaly.Wiki: Determines resistence to ACS Anomaly status inflict whilst guarding.

statusGuardResist_ElecDischarge.Wiki: Determines resistence to Electric Discharge status inflict whilst guarding.

statusGuardResist_Plasma.Wiki: Determines resistence to Plasma status inflict whilst guarding.

statusGuardResist_ElecDischargeType2.Wiki: Determines resistence to Electric Discharge (Type 2) status inflict whilst guarding.

parryAttack.Wiki: If this is greater than defender's Parry Defense, the attack cannot be parried.

parryDefense.Wiki: If this is equal to or greater than attacker's Parry Attack, the attack can be parried.

sfxSize.Wiki: Determines which version of a SpEffect's VFX to use (i.e. bigger poison clouds on bigger enemies).

hitStopType.Wiki: Setting whether to perform hit stop processing

ladderEndChkOffsetTop.Wiki: Upper side of the ladder end judgment offset

ladderEndChkOffsetLow.Wiki: Lower side of ladder end judgment offset

useRagdollCamHit.Wiki: Does the camera hit the enemy ragdoll? (Valid only when hitting the player)

disableClothRigidHit.Wiki: If you want to prevent the cross rigid from hitting you

isWeakA.Wiki: Special attack A? Special attack A damage multiplier will be included in the calculation

isGhost.Wiki: The opponent's attack will be able to slip through. The attack hits only when the anti-spirit weapon of the weapon para is attacked with the weapon of . Be careful not to confuse it with a wandering ghost

isNoDamageMotion.Wiki: Do you not play the damage motion when the damage is 0?

isUnduration.Wiki: Do you match the back and forth rotation of the character with the undulations of the ground? Cannot be used for flying characters

isChangeWanderGhost.Wiki: Will it be a wandering ghost when the player is a client?

ModelDispMask0.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

ModelDispMask1.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

ModelDispMask2.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

ModelDispMask3.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

ModelDispMask4.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

ModelDispMask5.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

ModelDispMask6.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

ModelDispMask7.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

ModelDispMask8.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

ModelDispMask9.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

ModelDispMask10.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

ModelDispMask11.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

ModelDispMask12.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

ModelDispMask13.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

ModelDispMask14.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

ModelDispMask15.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

isEnableNeckTurn.Wiki: Do you want to enable the swing set in Param Weaver?

isMoveAnimWait.Wiki: Do you want to play the moving animation until the animation is over? (Like a mayfly dragon.)

isCrowd.Wiki: Do you want to reduce the processing load during crowds? For babies (preferably phalanx)

isWeakB.Wiki: Special attack B? Special attack B damage multiplier will be included in the calculation

isWeakC.Wiki: Special attack C? Special attack C damage multiplier will be included in the calculation

isWeakD.Wiki: Special attack D? Special attack D damage multiplier will be included in the calculation

doesAlwaysUseSpecialTurn.Wiki: Always execute a special turn (even if there is no navigation mesh at the turn destination, the special turn is continuously executed)

isRideAtkTarget.Wiki: Will you be the target of a riding special attack (if you are riding)?

isEnableStepDispInterpolate.Wiki: Whether to use step-over display interpolation

isStealthTarget.Wiki: Is it a stealth attack target?

disableInitializeDead.Wiki: If you do not make an initial death, TRUE, even if you kill and save it, the corpse will not be reproduced.

isHitRumble.Wiki: TRUE if it vibrates when hit. Use when you want to change from a normal hit stop, such as a dead person.

isSmoothTurn.Wiki: Whether to perform interpolation when turning between nodes in route movement

isWeakE.Wiki: Special attack E? Special attack E damage multiplier will be included in the calculation

isWeakF.Wiki: Special attack F? Special attack F damage multiplier will be included in the calculation

ModelDispMask16.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

ModelDispMask17.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

ModelDispMask18.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

ModelDispMask19.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

ModelDispMask20.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

ModelDispMask21.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

ModelDispMask22.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

ModelDispMask23.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

ModelDispMask24.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

ModelDispMask25.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

ModelDispMask26.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

ModelDispMask27.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

ModelDispMask28.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

ModelDispMask29.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

ModelDispMask30.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

ModelDispMask31.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

itemSearchRadius.Wiki: Radius to be added as a correction to the cylinder radius of normal Item search judgment (applicable to enemy drop items. Used for large characters etc.)

chrHitHeight.Wiki: The height of the capsule per character.

isSoulGetByBoss.Wiki: Do you get a boss in soul?

isBulletOwner_byObject.Wiki: If you become the owner of a bullet, a flag that applies the object's damage calculation related to the bullet. Used for damage correction by power.

isUseLowHitFootIk.AltName: Use FootIK Filter for Low Hit
isUseLowHitFootIk.Wiki: Whether to use the FootIk filter for low hits

isCalculatePvPDamage.Wiki: Decide whether to calculate damage as a player when calculating damage. If it is invalid, it is treated as an enemy.

isHostSyncChr.Wiki: Can only be activated when active in the host world

isSkipWeakDamageAnim.Wiki: Weakness damage Whether to skip animation playback. Part damage rate and defense material are treated as weak points just by not playing the animation.

isKeepHitOnRide.Wiki: When riding on a character with this parameter , the character's Atari remains while riding.

def_dark.Wiki: Damage reduction base value for dark attacks.

threatLv.Wiki: Threat level. If it is 0, even if the PC is found, FE that seems to be found is not displayed.

specialTurnDistanceThreshold.Wiki: Make a special turn when the distance to the target is greater than or equal to the set threshold

autoFootEffectSfxId.Wiki: The SFX identifier used in the automatic foot effect. (ZZZ of XYYZZZ)

materialSe1.Wiki: Determine the SE that sounds when damaged. 1. It is OK to set it by appearance.

materialSfx1.Wiki: Determine the SFX that occurs when you take damage. 1. It is OK to set it by appearance.

materialSe_Weak2.Wiki: Determines the SE that sounds when the weak point is damaged. 2

materialSfx_Weak2.Wiki: Determines the SFX that occurs when the weak point is damaged. 2

materialSe2.Wiki: Determine the SE that sounds when damaged. 2. It is OK to set it by appearance.

materialSfx2.Wiki: Determine the SFX that occurs when you take damage. 2. It is OK to set it by appearance.

toughnessRecoverCorrection.Wiki: Correction value for toughness recovery time

kineticDamageCutRate.Wiki: Kinetic damage multiplier. The final damage value is the value obtained by multiplying the damage calculation result by this value.

slashDamageCutRate.Wiki: Slash damage multiplier. The final damage value is the value obtained by multiplying the damage calculation result by this value.

blowDamageCutRate.Wiki: Strike damage multiplier. The final damage value is the value obtained by multiplying the damage calculation result by this value.

thrustDamageCutRate.Wiki: Thrust damage ratio. The final damage value is the value obtained by multiplying the damage calculation result by this value.

energyDamageCutRate.Wiki: Energy damage multiplier. The final damage value is the value obtained by multiplying the damage calculation result by this value.

explosiveDamageCutRate.Wiki: Explosive damage multiplier. The final damage value is the value obtained by multiplying the damage calculation result by this value.

coralDamageCutRate.Wiki: Coral damage ratio. The final damage value is the value obtained by multiplying the damage calculation result by this value.

unknownDamageCutRate.Wiki: Dark damage multiplier. The final damage value is the value obtained by multiplying the damage calculation result by this value.

unknownDamageGuardCutRate.Wiki: How much to cut the dark attack?

npcPlayerWeightType.Wiki: Equipment weight type applied for NPC players

normalChangeAnimChrId.Wiki: Replace the target animation with the specified ID Anibnd

phantomShaderId.Wiki: ID of the phantom parameter .xlsm to apply

maxAnklePitchAngle.Wiki: FootIK Ankle pitch limit angle (-1 no limit). If you have not set Foot End L S in HAT, this angle is used in common with rolls.

statusResist_Uranium.Wiki: Determines resistence to Uranium status inflict.

freezeGuardResist.Wiki: How much to cut the attack power against Uranium (set as a special effect parameter)

lockCameraParamId.Wiki: The ID of the lock camera parameter applied to the camera when locked on. Highest priority. Unused if -1

disableLockOnAng.Wiki: Create a conical lock-on non-lockable area beneath the enemy. The angle of the size of the cone. Can be changed temporarily from TAE

clothOffLodLevel.AltName: LOD Level to Disable Cloth Processing
clothOffLodLevel.Wiki: Set the LOD level to turn off cross processing

WanderGhostPhantomId.Wiki: Phantom shader with ID specified only on the guest side Specify the phantom shader ID and make it an illusion

movementEnemyTypeParamId.Wiki: Determines movement specifics, such as what types of movement can be made and various speeds.

npcMaterialParamId.Wiki: Affects NPC design, such as paint.\nReferences rows in NpcMaterialParam. Rows references seem to be Character ID + this field.

showStabilityBar.Wiki: If stability bar should appear in UI.

penetrateDefense.Wiki: Affects which bullets penetrate this character. See Bullet param chrPenetrateType.

Self.Wiki: Defines the stats for a given enemy or group of enemies. Does not determine model or location.\nStats are often affected greatly by attached SpEffects.
